main event: An unidentified object, approximately 150 ft. in diameter, was observed over an 8,000 ft. mountain in Red Bluff, California.
interesting points: The object hung at a 10-degree elevation for 15-20 minutes before disappearing suddenly., The observers were looking in various directions but lost sight of the object coincident with it setting behind the mountain., The case was evaluated as veritus., The exact nature of the object remains classified as unknown., The sighting had a duration of approximately 15 minutes.
witness description: one observer who noted the characteristics of the object
